page.title: 09CLUBS IN RUARDEAN(GLOS)
page.content: { YOUTH CLUB} This is an organisation for youths under 21 and over 11. There are lots of games to play such as snooker, pool, table tennis, badminton, and lots more games and activities. In the summer we play rounders. It is 20p to get in and 50p to join.Youth club starts at 7.15 p.m. and ends at 9.30 p.m. It takes place at Ruardean Village Hall on Monday nights. It's great fun. {JAZZ BAND} This is a club that trains you really hard to keep in step and swing your arms in time. It's quite hard. The Jazz Band gets together on Friday nights. The time is 6.00p.m. until 9.00 p.m. It is at Ruardean Village Hall. We train all through the winter and in the summer we go out on trips.
